title: 2019 Marching Band Props

sections.title: 2019 Marching Band Props
sections.subtitle: Marching Band Props
sections.text: The 2019 Marching Band Props were designed and built by the students in the Maker at Play program. The props were designed to be modular and easily assembled and disassembled for transport and storage. The props were designed to be lightweight and durable and to be able to be used in a variety of configurations.
